info.title: Microsoft Sentinel Upload API
info.description: Specification for Microsoft Sentinel Upload API.

post.summary: Upload Stix objects to the workspace
post.description: Upload an array of Stix objects to the workspace specified

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID for the Stix objects to be uploaded.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Body of the request with an array of Stix objects and other properties

200.description: The API returns 200 when at least one Stix object is successfully validated and published.

default.description: Upload Stix Objects API service error response.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

JsonPropertyBag.description: An object that stores a list of JSON properties from a given JObject.

sourcesystem.description: Source of the Stix objects to be uploaded. Source system name cannot be Microsoft Sentinel. Maximum length is 256 characters.

stixobjects.description: The stixobjects param is an array of Stix objects. Stix objects need to be in STIX format. We only support Stix 2.0 and 2.1 format.

UploadStixObjectsResponse.description: Response object containing more details about the operation.

errors.description: Details of the error. Contains a list of Stix objects validation errors

StixObjectsValidationError.description: Object that stores a list of errors encountered when executing the Upload operation.

recordIndex.description: Index of the Stix objects in stixobjects array from request.

validationErrorMessages.description: List of validation errors for a single Stix object.

ErrorResponseBody.description: The definition of an error object.

ErrorData.description: Detailed information about the errors from the operation.

code.description: Server defined code for the error
